article_title: Ontario reports 31 new deaths from COVID-19, 411 new cases - Toronto Sun
article_description: Ontario reports 31 new deaths from COVID 19  411 new cases Toronto Sun Ford extends Ontario s emergency COVID 19 measures to April 23 CTV News Ontario sees 411 new COVID 19 cases  as province extends emergency orders to April 23 CBC ca LILLEY  Doug Ford brace
article_content: Doug Ford extended emergency orders meant to stop the spread of COVID 19  but the Ontario premier is unsure whether schools will shut for the year The emergency orders will be extended until Apr  23  Ford said on Saturday  as he revealed the province s deat   2079 chars
